module.name: Job Board
module.description: This module allows employers, who may or may not be a registered ATutor member, to post employment opportunities. An administrator can moderate job postings. Employers can edit and maintain a organization/company's job postings. Potential employees can subscribe the various job categories to receive notices when relevant jobs are posted, and can bookmark jobs to keep track of their job search.

release.notes: See the module's README file for installation and usage instructions.
